statements.select:
WITH CTE (ID, HierID, Level, SeqNo) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.DepartmentName, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , 1 AS Level , CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.DepartmentName, AA.ID) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SeqNo FROM dbo.TDepartment AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
And AA.ID = #ParentID#
AND AA.ParentID IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(BB.HierID + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.DepartmentName, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , BB.Level + 1 AS Level , CAST(BB.SeqNo + '.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.DepartmentName, AA.ID)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SeqNo FROM dbo.TDepartment AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB ON AA.ParentID = BB.ID ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.HierID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.DepartmentName , AA.ParentID , AA.ManagerID , AA.UseYn
, EE.EmployeeName as ManagerName
, BB.HierID , REPLICATE(' ', (BB.Level -1) * 5) + BB.SeqNo + '. ' + AA.DepartmentName AS HierName , BB.Level
FROM dbo.TDepartment AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB ON AA.ID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ManagerID = EE.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.DepartmentName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.DepartmentName , AA.ParentID , AA.UseYn , AA.ManagerID
, BB.EmployeeName as ManagerName , DD.StartDate
FROM dbo.TDepartment AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ManagerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TDepartmentHist DD WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = DD.DepartmentID AND DD.EndDate IS NULL WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TDepartment ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, DepartmentName, ParentID, UseYn, ManagerID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #DepartmentName#, #ParentID#, #UseYn#, #ManagerID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TDepartment SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, DepartmentName = #DepartmentName# , ParentID = #ParentID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , ManagerID = #ManagerID# WHERE ID = #ID#
